summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West Seventieth Street, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Fifteenth Avenue Northwest; and Thirteenth Avenue Northwest, Dibble Avenue Northwest and Eighth Avenue Northwest, each, from West Seventy-third Street to West Seventieth Street, all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
